snippet.title: Paintball Trailer
snippet.description: Paintball is a top down puzzle game. Up to three players control three characters (blue, red, yellow) who throw a ball back and forth. While travelling , the ball creates a line of the color of the player who threw it. If a ball is travelling over an already existing line the former color, and the new color mix together. In every level, players face a given task consisting of a colored geometric shape that must be copied.
